Welcome to Internet2 CLASS!

CLASS offers hands-on experiential learning, incubators, and a growing community of practice to support workforce development within research and higher education (R&E).

View Upcoming Events

CLASS Program Elements

Learning Modules

CLASS offers hands-on, learning experiences that help higher education institutions move cloud forward.

Incubators

CLASS collaborates with various institutional partners to accelerate the adoption of cloud computing for research and higher education.

CLASS Community

CLASS aims to build a robust R&E community ready to move cloud forward! When you participate in any CLASS Learning module or Incubator program, you automatically become part of the CLASS community.

Incubator Programs

In October 2022, Internet2 CLASS and Microsoft Azure launched the inaugural Azure Accelerator for Research Program. Five projects were selected to receive up to $5000 in credits, access to hands-on Azure workshops, and technical help from Azure solutions architect. Find out more about the projects on Github.

Sign up for the CLASS Mailing List to be the first to hear about the next CLASS Incubator Program!
